definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Samuel (= name of Ēl Thes al. (or, his name is Ēl Hom:Heb.Trad. 98 f. Wkl:KAT 3. 225 Now 181, 20), cf. [[פּנוּאֵל]], [[רְעוּאֵל]]; v. Dr:181, 20; Prät:ZMG 1903, 777 ff. caritative from [[יִשְׁמָעֵאל]]; Palm. [[שמואל]] Lzb:377; v. further Gie:AT Schätzung d. Gottesn. (1901), 102 ff.);—

great prophet, 11th cent. B.C., samouhl: 1Sa 1:20 (name expl. as if from [[שָׁאַל]]), 1Sa 1:18, 1Sa 1:21, 1Sa 1:26 + 125 t. 1 S, 1Ch 6:13, 1Ch 6:18, 1Ch 9:22, 1Ch 11:3, 1Ch 26:28, 1Ch 29:29, 2Ch 35:18, Je 15:1, Ps 99:6. †
